summary: This category refers to the field of information technology (IT), focusing on various aspects such as digital transformation, agile leadership, and technological advancements. It emphasizes the role of technology in improving team performance and fostering innovation within organizations. Relevant profiles include industry leaders who contribute to the IT community through initiatives like events, team-building activities, and public advocacy.
excerpt: Learn about Jan Hein Hoogstad, aka Yeehaa, an entrepreneur and software architect. Founder of Varias and creator of the Superconnectors event, he aims to enhance team performance using technology.
